resources.string: Please provide your Phone Number to proceed with the request
Congratulations on taking a vital initiative towards your own and your family’s health!
Would you like to verify your email id now? We sent you an email on your registered email id with the code to verify your email id. Please enter the code provided in the mail to verify.
Password must be between 5 to 20 characters and must have at least 1 special character or a number or a capital letter.
Thanks for showing your interest in Jeevom.Kindly verify your email/phone number.
"Please verify your Phone number to continue.
* If you have not received the code yet, regenerate your code.
We sent you a verification message to your e-mail. Please click the link that you have received in your e-mail.
Enter below the code that is mentioned in your E-mail
Give us a missed call on
Enter below the code that is received by SMS
The fun is about to begin....... stay tuned!!!

We are taking Baby Steps to achieve the Giant Leap. While We are busy fixing the nuts & bolts of this comprehensive healthcare platform, you are welcome to Jeevom and become our flagship early adopter.
We promise to enthrall you by the ease, elegance and assortment of functionalities to take care of your Health, Wellness and Medical needs.
Your following information is being shared
The email id or phone number you entered already exists. Do you want to set your Password?
Note: We use this number only to send you the required details.

This legal notice applies to the entire contents of the Websites under the domain names Jeevom.com, (the ‘Website’) and to any correspondence by e-mail between us and you. Please read these terms carefully before using the Website. Using the Website indicates that you accept these terms regardless of whether or not you choose to register with us. If you do not accept these terms, do not use the Website. This notice is issued by Jeevom Healthcare Pvt. Ltd.
1.1 By accessing any part of this Website, you shall be deemed to have accepted these terms in full. If you do not accept these terms in full you must leave this Application.

1.2 We reserve the right to change these terms at any time without prior notice. You should check this Website regularly to review the terms because they are binding on you. Certain provisions of these terms may be superseded by expressly designated legal notices or terms located on particular pages at this Website.
This Website is Copyright © Jeevom Healthcare Pvt. Ltd.

2.1 We do not guarantee that access to this Application will be continuously available and will not be liable if for any reason (including but not limited to) the Application being suspended temporarily and without notice in the case of system failure, maintenance or repair or for reasons beyond the Company\'s control.
2.2 We reserve the right to withdraw or restrict access to the Application without notice for any user who is registered with us and/or is deemed to be in breach of these terms.
3.1 You will not use the Application for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these terms.
3.2 You must not misuse the Website site by knowingly introducing viruses, trojans or any other material which is malicious or technologically harmful in breach of the Computer Misuse Act 1990.
3.3 You must not attempt to gain unauthorised access to the Website, the server on which the Website is stored or any server, computer or database connected to the Website.

4.1 The Application may include links to third party websites that are controlled and maintained by others. Any link to any other website is not an endorsement of such website and the Company accepts no responsibility or liability for any material supplied by or contained on any third party websites linked from or to this website.

5.1 You may link to our home page, provided you do so in a way that is fair and legal and does not seek to damage our reputation or take undue advantage of it or suggest that any form of association or endorsement exists on our part when this is not the case. We reserve the right to withdraw linking permission without notice.
This right is subject to the following conditions:
(a) you must not establish a link from any website that is not operated by you;
(b) you must not replicate the home page of our Website;
(c) you do not remove, distort or otherwise alter the size or appearance of the Jeevom logo;
(d) you do not create a frame or any other browser or border environment around this Website;
(e) you do not in any way imply that the Company endorses any products or services other than our own;
(f) you do not otherwise use any trademarks or material subject to copyright displayed on this Website without our express written permission;

(g) your website does not contain content that is distasteful, offensive or controversial, infringes any intellectual property rights or other rights of any other person or otherwise does not comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

6.1 The Intellectual Property Rights in this Website and the materials on or accessible via it belong to the Company and/or our licensors. The Website and the materials on or accessible via it and the Intellectual Property Rights therein may not be copied, distributed, published, licensed, used or reproduced in any way save to the exception that you are permitted to print and download extracts from the Website for your own use subject to the following conditions:
(a) no documents or related graphics on this Website are modified in any way;
(b) no graphics on this Website are used out of context or separate from any relevant accompanying text; and
(c) any of our copyright and trade mark notices and this permission notice appear in all copies.

6.2 Subject to clause 6.1, no part of this Website may be reproduced then stored in any website or included in any public or private electronic retrieval system or service without our prior written permission.

6.3 If your permission to use this Website is terminated in accordance with clause 2.2 you must immediately destroy any downloaded or printed extracts from this Website. For these purposes "Intellectual Property Rights" includes the following: any patent, trade mark, trade name, service mark, service name, design, design right, copyright, database right, moral rights, know how, trade secret and other confidential information, rights in the nature of any of these items in any country, rights in the nature of unfair competition rights and rights to sue for passing off or other similar intellectual or commercial right (in each case whether or not registered or register able) and registrations of and applications to register any of them.
7.1 We process information about you in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our Website you consent to such processing and you warrant that all data provided by you is accurate.

8.1 Although we have taken due care in compiling this Website, the materials on or accessible via our website are provided without any guarantees, conditions or warranties as to its accuracy. The Company accepts no liability whatsoever for any errors, inaccuracies or omissions.

8.2 The materials on or accessible via our website are not intended to amount to advice on which any reliance should be placed. We therefore disclaim all liability and responsibility arising from any reliance placed on such materials by any user of our site, or by anyone who may be informed of its contents.

9.2 Any of the material on our Website may be out of date at any given time and we make no warranty that the defects will be corrected.

10.1 To the extent permitted by law, the Company, other members of our group of companies and third parties connected to us will not be liable for any indirect or consequential loss or damage (including without limitation loss of business, opportunity, data, profits, goodwill, anticipated savings) or any other loss or damage of any kind whether caused by tort, breach of contract or otherwise, even if foreseeable, arising out of or in connection with the use of the Website.
